resources.string:
==Discovery== **Discovered by:** Clyde W. Tombaugh
 **Discovery date:** February 18, 1930
==Orbital characteristics== **Distance from sun:** 5,906 million km (39.5 AU)
 **Aphelion:** 7,376 million km (49.3 AU)
 **Perihelion:** 4,437 million km (29.7 AU)
 **Eccentricity:** 0.249
 **Orbital period:** 248.1 years
 **Average orbital speed:** 4.666 km/s
 **Inclination to ecliptic:** 17.14°
 **Satellites:** 3
==Physical characteristics== **Mean radius:** 1,153 km (0.18 Earths)
 **Volume:** 6,39×10^^9^^ km³ (0.0059 Earths)
 **Mass:** 1.305×10^^22^^ kg (0.0021 Earths)
 **Mean density:** 2.03 g/cm³
 **Equatorial surface gravity:** 0.658 m/s² (0.067 g)
 **Escape velocity:** 1.229 km/s
 **Sidereal rotation period:** 6d 9h 17m
 **Equatorial rotation velocity:** 47.18 km/h
 **Axial tilt:** 119.6° (to orbit)
 **Albedo:** 0.49–0.66 (geometric, varies by 35%)
 **Surface temp:** 33K(min) 44K(mean) 55K(max)
==Atmosphere== **Surface pressure:** 0.30 Pa (summer maximum)
 **Composition:** nitrogen, methane


Find out more on [[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pluto|wikipedia]].
